summary: Backend developer in backoffice team. Refactoring legacy code, optimize bottlenecks, improve architecture of codebase. Team management: elaboration of personal goals of team members, assistance in achieving them. Search balance between Tech Debt Tasks and Business Tasks. Integration with other teams.
Backend for project "Bank of partners" on Yii2 + MySQL

Backend and Frontend develpment of ecommerce websites dns-shop.ru and technopoint.ru; work with Yii2, Postgresql, Memcached, Redis. Took part in create UI for self-service terminals on Angular2+. In the end of work took part in coding of backend for online chat on Nodejs: framework SailsJS; setup linting tools for PHP, js, typescript and scss; writing unit-testing for new features, got expirience in TDD.

Development and maintenance of internal projects of the company, as well as the main company site - PrimaMedia.ru. Got experience with Yii2. Setup automatic deployment of sites, migration from FTP to GIT, setting up automatic assembly of the frontend and installing Sphinx as the main search engine for sites.

Work with classic web full-stack: PHP, JS, HTML, CSS, MySQL. Create and maintenance client websites on popular CMS. In the end of work learned GIT, unit-testing, deploy systems and frontend compiler Gulp
